generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and scattered leaves, extending into the distance with parked cars and trees on both sides.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a low fence and some vegetation, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: Several residential buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including multi-story houses with windows and some with visible facades.
- fence: A white fence is visible along the right side of the sidewalk, separating the sidewalk from a property.
- pole: A pole with a traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a red border (indicating "no entry" or "no through traffic") is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves are visible along both sides of the road, and some bushes are visible near the sidewalk.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible near the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper center of the image.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the fence.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road, wearing a helmet.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a black van and a black sedan.
- truck: A blue and white trailer is attached to a vehicle on the left side of the road, which appears to be a truck or van.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the right side of the sidewalk, near the fence.
